Body: I want to recover some photo deleted from my DCIM folder. But the problem is I cant get my phone to be detected as a drive letter in “My Computer”. How to make my phone detected? I already enable USB debugging mode when trying to scan my phone with the recovery apps, but just cant detect.Please don't tell me to unmount the memory card to scan because my phone doesnt have memory card. It uses only internal phone memory.
Title: Recover deleted photo from Xperia P phone

history.Text: Hi i wanna to recover some photo deleted on my DCIM file. But the problem is i cant get my phone to be detected as a drive letter in “My Computer”. How to make my phone detected ? I already enable USB debugging mode when trying to scan my phone with the recovery apps, but just cant detect. Please help !! Those photo really important to me. Please aslo dont tell mr to unmount the memory card to scan because my phone doesnt have memory card. Its use only internal phone memory. Please anyone please help..... T.T
Getting recover deleted photo from xperia p phone

history.Comment: fixed spelling and improved formatting, corrected tag
